burgerMenu.previewMessage: App in preview mode. Navigations are available in built apps only.

auth.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
auth.unexpectedLoginError: An unexpected error occurred during login.

MyAccount.editSuccess: Your account has been updated successfully.
MyAccount.deleteWarning: Warning: Deleting your account will remove all your data permanently.
MyAccount.deleteSuccess: Your account has been deleted successfully.
MyAccount.invalidPictureFile: Invalid image file. Please select a valid image file.
MyAccount.confirmDeletePicture: Are you sure you want to delete your profile picture?
MyAccount.deletePictureWarning: Deleting your profile picture will remove it permanently. You can add a new one later.

passwordReset.title: Password Reset
passwordReset.intro: Forgot your password? Enter your email address below, and we will send you instructions on how to set a new password.
passwordReset.emailSent: We have sent you instructions on how to set a new password, if an account with this email address exists. The email should arrive shortly.

registration.title: Create Account
registration.successText: Your account has been created successfully and you have been logged in.

privacySettings.vimeoDescription: We use videos from the provider Vimeo (Vimeo.com, Inc., 555 West 18th Street, New York, New York 10011, USA) to provide video content. When you enable this option, a connection to Vimeo's servers will be established. This will inform the Vimeo server which of our pages you have visited. Additionally, Vimeo may store cookies on your device and process data (e.g., IP address, device information, usage behavior). Data transmission to the USA is possible. For more information about data processing by Vimeo, please see Vimeo's Privacy Policy.
privacySettings.vimeoDescriptionShort: This video is provided by Vimeo. When you enable it, a connection to Vimeo will be established and personal data (e.g., IP address) may be transmitted. By enabling, you consent to data processing by Vimeo. Vimeo's Privacy Policy.
privacySettings.rejectText: You can withdraw your consent at any time in the privacy settings.
privacySettings.youtubeDescription: We use videos from the provider YouTube (Google Ireland Limited, Gordon House, Barrow Street, Dublin 4, Ireland) to provide video content. When you enable this option, a connection to YouTube's servers will be established. This will inform the YouTube server which of our pages you have visited. Additionally, YouTube may store cookies on your device and process data (e.g., IP address, device information, usage behavior). Data transmission to the USA is possible. For more information about data processing by YouTube, please see Google's Privacy Policy.
privacySettings.youtubeDescriptionShort: This video is provided by YouTube. When you enable it, a connection to YouTube will be established and personal data (e.g., IP address) may be transmitted. By enabling, you consent to data processing by YouTube. Google's Privacy Policy.

validation.max: A maximum of {{max}} characters is allowed
validation.formHasErrors: The data you entered is invalid. Please check your form.

geolocation.setManually: GPS error. Please enter the position manually.
geolocation.selectLocationOnMap: Please select the location on the map

observationForm.waitForImageUpload: Please wait until all images have been uploaded.
observationForm.reallyRemovePicture: Do you really want to remove this picture?
observationForm.editSuccess: Your changes have been saved successfully
observationForm.imageLicenceRemark: Your photos will be published under the license CC BY-NC-ND 4.0. The image author is the reporter.
observationForm.pictureLicenceRemark: Your photos will be published under the license CC BY-NC-ND 4.0. The image author is the reporter.

permissionDenied.title: Access Denied
permissionDenied.message: You do not have permission to access this feature.
permissionDenied.description: Please contact the administrator if you think this is an error.

myObservations.deleteWarning: Warning: Deleting an observation will remove it permanently.

sync.networkWarningMessage: This will sync your observations with the server. Please ensure you have a stable internet connection.
